title: $770 - 2 Bed/1 Bath Condo with Garbage Included and Walk-in Closet
posting_body: Please contact us by text at
if you would like to schedule a tour or have any questions.
There is immediate availability for the newly renovated 2 bed/1 bath, 758 ft² condo.

Designed with comfort in mind, our floor plans feature a wide array of stylishly efficient amenities such as a stove and fridge, pantry, tile flooring, and mini blinds, … Highways US-59 and I-610 are easily accessible.
Nearby are local convenience stores such as Lyons Supermarket, Henderson Elementary School, and Shell Gas Station.
Comfort at its best is what we strive to provide for you.
